get.description: Lists all the operations supported by Microsoft.DevOps resource provider.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used with the HTTP request.

200.description: The list of supported operations has been fetched successfully.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation applies to data-plane.

resource.description: Friendly name of the resource type the operation applies to.

provider.description: Friendly name of the resource provider.

value.description: List of operations supported by Microsoft.DevOps resource provider.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of operations, if there are any.

schema.description: Result of a request to list all operations supported by Microsoft.DevOps resource provider.

get.description: Lists all pipeline templates which can be used to configure a Pipeline.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used with the HTTP request.

200.description: The pipeline template definitions have been fetched successfully.

schema.description: Result of a request to list all pipeline template definitions.

id.description: Unique identifier of the pipeline template.

description.description: Description of the pipeline enabled by the template.

inputs.description: List of input parameters required by the template to create a pipeline.

items.description: Representation of a pipeline template input parameter.

id.description: Identifier of the input parameter.

type.description: Data type of the value of the input parameter.

possibleValues.description: List of possible values for the input parameter.

items.description: Representation of a pipeline template input parameter value.

displayValue.description: Description of the input parameter value.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of pipeline template definitions, if there are any.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Azure subscription. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used with the HTTP request.

parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the Pipeline resource in ARM.

parameters.name: createOperationParameters
parameters.description: The request payload to create the Pipeline.

schema.description: Pipeline used to configure Continuous Integration (CI) & Continuous Delivery (CD) for Azure resources.

id.description: Resource Id

pipelineType.description: Specifies which CI/CD provider to use. Valid options are 'azurePipeline', 'githubWorkflow'.

bootstrapConfiguration.description: Configuration used to bootstrap the Pipeline.

sourceRepository.description: Repository containing the source code for the pipeline. Currently only 'azurePipeline' pipeline type supports this.

id.description: Unique immutable identifier of the code repository.

defaultBranch.description: Default branch used to configure Continuous Integration (CI) in the pipeline.

authorization.description: Authorization info to access the code repository.

parameters.description: Authorization parameters corresponding to the authorization type.

template.description: Template used to bootstrap the pipeline.

id.description: Unique identifier of the pipeline template.

parameters.description: Dictionary of input parameters used in the pipeline template.

systemData.description: The system metadata pertaining to this resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

200.description: The Pipeline has been configured successfully.

patch.description: Updates the properties of an Azure Pipeline. Currently, it is not supported on 'githubWorkflow' pipeline type and only tags can be updated for 'azurePipeline' pipeline type.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Azure subscription. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used with the HTTP request.

parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Pipeline resource.

parameters.name: updateOperationParameters
parameters.description: The request payload containing the properties to update in the Azure Pipeline.

schema.description: Request payload used to update an existing Azure Pipeline.

tags.description: Dictionary of key-value pairs to be set as tags on the Azure Pipeline. This will overwrite any existing tags.

200.description: The Azure Pipeline has been updated successfully.

error.description: Details of the error from the Pipelines Resource Provider.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Pipelines Resource Provider.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error or the method where the error occurred.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Pipelines Resource Provider.
